markdownRemark.html:
Today I Learned

1. Redux, JS, & HTML UI

Day 1: June 19, 2019 - Thursday

Project: Udacity React Nanodegree Program


Live Demo: Redux Todo Goals App on CodeSandbox

Progress: Continued Udacity Redux lesson for my React Nanodegree Program.

This lesson focused implementing Redux with vanilla JavaScript and a simple HTML UI.

The kept the focus limited to:

  • The store
  • Getting state
  • Subscribing to state changes
  • Dispatching actions

You can read more in my notes: Udacity React & Redux - 2.4 Introducing Redux

Links:

  • Live Demo - Redux Todo Goals App on CodeSandbox
  • Repo - Redux Todos & Goals App on GitHub
  • Course notes - Udacity React & Redux
  • Link to Udacity React Nanodegree Program
